title: Western serif and a sans --Need ID please!
content:
Hi everyone,

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204124942im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/heritage_5768.jpg)
  
Well, there you go—I need to find out what the “Heritage” font is as well as the surrounding sans for a client. Can you help me?

Much appreciated!

 [‹ Rio 65 Trio album cover](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204124942/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37734 "Go to previous forum topic") [Help with Rounded Sans/Typewriter ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204124942/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37951 "Go to next forum topic")
author: toog

comments.content:
“HERITAGE” is Rosewood Fill, with distress added.

“PREMIUM COLLECTION” &c. is Engravers Gothic BT (with that funky ampersand).

“BOOTCUT” could be one of the Knockout fonts.

- Lex

Beautiful! I guessed Knockout but I just couldn’t believe they would have it in their collection. Nice! Thanks again!
